title: pulsefire ezreal out of hextech crate

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: hey guys im level 10 and i just unboxed this skin. should i disenchant it or no?

replies.body:
"disenchant it" i...

I cant tell if this is a troll or actually serious.

Also just dont disenchant stuff, ever, until you actually need the essence. No reason to do it prematurely, you may start playing the champion.

It's a pretty nice skin tbh.
Idk if it's worth the RP amount anymore with the overall increase in quality in skins, but getting it through crafting is pretty nice.

Here is how I would look at it though;
1. Do you play Ez?
2. You are likely to get other skin shards in the future you'll like and that essence would be a very nice cause to getting them.
3. While it is cheaper for essence than RP, it does still take /a lot/ of orange essence to enchant that.

There are other tidbits but from someone who has opened a shit ton of Hextech Crafting chests those are the most important three to consider really.
You always want to remember Hextech Crafting is an investment for the future, something that adds up bits over time till you finally make it worth it.
I got DJ sona the other day from hextech and I stopped playing karma to learn sona, now I adc/support main instead of jg. Rip my jungling skills.

do you play Ezreal?

its a hella of a skin, if I was you. Id make Ezreal my main right away
